author: Harron Walker, Casey Johnston
title: This 'Virus-Free' Retreat Sounds Like a Pandemic Hot Spot Waiting to Happen
description: The ill-conceived “Harbor” promises group respite from COVID-19 for as little as $3,000 a month and flies in the face of every known warning about the pandemic.
content: For weeks now, the universal recommendation to slow the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic has been to stay away from other people and shelter in place unless absolutely necessary. Many people are unable to follow that recommendation, as they either have to keep… [+3079 chars]
